chunks.text: Guys, in today's video, I will give you an exercise and whoever solves this exercise, I will give a shoutout to them.

chunks.text: And it will be based on the concepts we have studied so far in the Sigma Web Development course.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So, I am very excited to give you a question.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So, guys, I have come to my computer screen.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: As you can see, if you have not accessed the playlist yet, then you can click here and bookmark this playlist.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.text: Now, for the question I want to give you, I will first make a folder.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: If you accept it, I will feel good from the bottom of my heart.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: What you guys do here is that I will make an index.html file here.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And I will give you a question.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So, the question is, you are given 12 video files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: 12 files, 6 audio and 6 video.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And 6 video.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Design a website using HTML only.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And which shows these 12 files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Okay, I will toggle word wrap here so that you can see.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Word wrap.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So what you have to do is that you have been given 12 files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And what is the name of those files?

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So let me tell you what the name of those files is.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: 1.mp3, 2.mp3, all the way till 6.mp3.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: These are your mp3 files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Then you have 1.mp4, 2.mp4, all the way till 6.mp4.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Okay, you have these files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So you have to show all these 12 files by previewing.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So I hope it will be done.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: It's a very simple question.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And you guys comment quickly and write Challenge Accepted.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Because if you accept this challenge, then you write Challenge Accepted in the first person.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And whoever will give me their code here, I will give them a shoutout.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: The one who writes Challenge Accepted will definitely get a shoutout.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And you guys tell me in the comment section.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So I hope you guys will complete it.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And it's a very simple problem.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: I know a lot of people will say that it's very simple.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: One more thing I will expect from you guys is that you try to use as many concepts as I have told you.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Try to solve this question.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So this was our question for today.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: I hope you guys enjoyed it.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: I will select it and do Ctrl Forward Slash.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And what happens by doing Ctrl Forward Slash?

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: You can uncomment or comment.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So if I press Ctrl Forward Slash, then it will be uncomment.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And if I press Ctrl Forward Slash again, then it will be comment.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So you have to complete this website.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: It's a very simple problem.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: It's a straightforward problem.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Everyone must solve it.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So that's it for this video.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Thank you so much for watching this video.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And I will see you next time.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Bye.
